title: Buterin donates to 2 projects pushing ‘next steps’ of digital privacy
contentSnippet: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin has just donated over $760,000 in Ether to two projects he says is pushing digital privacy forward.

title: リップル社のステーブルコイン「RLUSD」、アブダビADGMが正式認定
contentSnippet: 中東での企業利用が加速へリップル社は27日、同社の米ドル連動型ステーブルコイン「RLUSD」が、アブダビ金融サービス規制庁（FSRA）により「法定通貨参照トークン」として正式に認定されたと発表した。アブダビ国際金融センター（ADGM）の規制...

title: Australia moves forward with bill to regulate crypto under finance laws
contentSnippet: Australia has taken another step to bring about legislation that will place crypto platforms under the same laws and licensing obligations as financial institutions.

title: DOGE Builds Bullish Structure With Higher Lows as ETFs Fail to Wow
contentSnippet: Technical analysis shows DOGE breaking above resistance with a significant volume surge, indicating bullish momentum.

title: XRP Prints V-Shaped Recovery as ETF Catalysts Align With Technicals
contentSnippet: Technical indicators suggest strong momentum, with XRP trading in an ascending broadening wedge and targeting further gains if it remains above key support levels.

title: XRP ETFs absorb 80M tokens: Is a new bull trend starting for the altcoin?
contentSnippet: Two new XRP ETFs absorbed 80 million tokens on launch as the price formed a bullish flag after hitting resistance at $2.20.

title: This indicator suggests we’re out of the Bitcoin bull market
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's 200-day trend has turned bearish, which could suggest the bull market is over, but some analysts don’t think we’re there yet.

title: Australia Moves to Regulate Crypto Platforms Under New Consumer-Protection Law
contentSnippet: The new framework subjects exchanges and custody providers to financial services laws with ASIC as the primary regulator.

title: Xapo Bank、ビットコイン信用ファンドの提供範囲を拡大
contentSnippet: ジブラルタルのXapo Bankがビットコイン建て信用ファンドを全会員に拡大。初期段階で1億ドル調達。2022年の業界崩壊後、厳格なリスク管理で市場回復。長期BTC保有者向けに安定利回りを提供。

title: ビットコイン需要の低迷続く　市場は横ばいか＝Glassnode分析
contentSnippet: Glassnodeが最新市場レポートで、仮想通貨ビットコインの需要低迷を指摘した。新たな資金流入が回復するまで市場は狭いレンジで推移する可能性が高いと分析している。

title: タイ当局、サム・アルトマンのワールドコインに120万件の虹彩データ削除を命令
contentSnippet: タイ個人情報保護委員会が、生体認証プロジェクトWorldに対し、仮想通貨と引き換えに虹彩スキャンデータを収集した行為が個人情報保護法違反として、120万件のデータ削除と業務停止を命令。世界各国でも同様の規制措置が相次いでいる。

title: 世界取引所連合が米SECに書簡、仮想通貨企業への免除措置見直しを要請　トークン化株式に懸念
contentSnippet: 世界取引所連合が米証券取引委員会にトークン化株式を提供する仮想通貨企業への包括的な免除措置の見直しを求める書簡を送付した。ナスダックやCMEグループなどが加盟する同連合は、適切な規制遵守なしに仮想通貨プラットフォームが証券取引所の役割を果たすことへの懸念を表明。

title: Bearish Bitcoin mining data may be counter signal that encourages spot-driven BTC rally
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s miner margins and NVT metric indicated a bottom range, but a final downside sweep remains possible.

title: Nasdaq ISE Seeks to Quadruple Trading Limits on BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Options
contentSnippet: The move marks a shift that would bring Bitcoin derivatives in line with major equities and deepen institutional access to the market.

title: Korea's Upbit Suspends Deposit And Withdrawal Service After $37M in Abnormal Activity in Solana Tokens
contentSnippet: Upbit has suspended digital asset withdrawals after detecting irregular activity involving Solana network tokens.

title: Animoca bets on altcoin upside to lure investors as it plans for IPO
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ founder, Yat Siu, anticipates that the crypto industry will not have a one-winner “takes all” scenario like the internet era in the early 2000s.

title: SEC tokenized stock exemptions should be targeted, stock exchanges argue
contentSnippet: A group representing major stock exchanges has urged the SEC to abandon its plan to grant an “innovation exemption” to brokers and crypto firms seeking to offer tokenized stocks.

title: Bitcoin risks deeper drop if whale exchange deposits stay high: Analyst
contentSnippet: Bitcoin whale deposits to exchanges surged to 9,000 BTC on Nov. 21, with large holders driving 45% of inflows. If it keeps up, Bitcoin could have more to fall.

title: Bitcoin's Ascent May Hit a Wall Around Mid-$90K: Trading Firm
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has surged past the $90,000 mark, buoyed by rising expectations of a December Federal Reserve rate cut.

title: Nasdaq seeks to ‘super-size’ option limits for BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF
contentSnippet: The push from the Nasdaq to increase option limits for the BlackRock Bitcoin fund shows Bitcoin markets are “breaking out of their training wheels.”

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Bitcoin's Fragile Rally is Built on Shrinking Liquidity
contentSnippet: Large holder deposits have hit exchanges and realized losses are climbing, according to CryptoQuant and Glassnode, indicating the market’s rally is being built on thin liquidity.

title: DWF Labs launches $75M fund for ‘institutional phase’ of DeFi
contentSnippet: Crypto market maker DWF Labs’ fund has been earmarked for dark pool DEXs, decentralized money markets, and yield-bearing products.

title: 「BTCが74000ドルまで下落しても転換社債に対する価値は5.9倍」ストラテジー、債務の安全性を強調
contentSnippet: ストラテジー社は、仮想通貨ビットコインの価格が同社の平均購入価格である74,000ドルまで下落しても、転換社債に対して5.9倍の資産を保有していることになると投稿。債務の安全性を強調した。

title: 韓国最大級仮想通貨取引所Upbit、ネイバーと合併　約1.5兆円規模の株式交換で傘下に
contentSnippet: 韓国IT大手ネイバーが仮想通貨取引所Upbit運営のドゥナムを1.5兆円規模で買収。韓国国内シェア7割超のUpbitとネイバーペイを統合し総合デジタル金融エコシステムを構築。2025年6月の合併発効を目指す。

title: BTCマイナーのクリーンスパーク決算発表、売上高が過去最高に　AIインフラを拡大中
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のビットコインマイナー、クリーンスパークが決算報告。過去最高の売上高を記録した。AIとビットコインの両ワークロード対応の包括的プラットフォームへ進化中だ。

title: Global Exchanges Urge SEC to Curb Broad Crypto Exemptions, Warn on Tokenized Stock Risks
contentSnippet: The SEC is being warned not to let crypto firms bypass investor protection rules as it considers exemptive relief for tokenized stocks.

title: ソラナ特化型ウペクシが最大35億円調達、SOL財務戦略などに利用
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のウペクシが普通株式とワラントの私募により最大2300万ドルを調達すると発表した。調達資金は仮想通貨ソラナ財務戦略と運転資本に充てられる予定だ。

title: セキュリタイズがEU取引決済システム認可を取得、アバランチで展開へ
contentSnippet: セキュリタイズがスペイン国家証券市場委員会からEU全域での取引決済システム運営認可を取得した。同社は米国とEUの両方でライセンスを持つ唯一の企業となり、欧州システムはアバランチ上に展開される。

title: Why Is Bitcoin Down? Blame Trump, Says Economist Paul Krugman
contentSnippet: Bitcoin critic Krugman says it's no coincidence that BTC is down, just as crypto-friendly President Trump stumbles in the polls.

title: New UAE Sweeping Banking Decree Looks to Cement Country’s Global Crypto Position
contentSnippet: UAE’s new financial law brings crypto and blockchain into traditional finance and under Central Bank’s supervision.

title: S&P Downgrades Tether's USDT Stability to 'Weak' Due to Bitcoin Backing Concerns
contentSnippet: S&P Global Ratings has downgraded Tether's USDT, warning that the industry-leading stablecoin could suffer if Bitcoin's price crashes. Tether disagrees.

title: APT Trades Little Changed, Undeperforms Wider Crypto Market Rally
contentSnippet: The token has support around the $2.16 level and resistance at $2.31.

title: Bitcoin Reclaims $90K Ahead of Thanksgiving as Ethereum, XRP Bounce Back
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has broken above $90,000 per coin again, nearly a week after it dipped to a seven-month low of about $81,000.

title: Nasdaq ISE Files to Lift BlackRock IBIT Option Limits Into Top Tier Status
contentSnippet: Filing comes amid rapid growth in IBIT options activity and a migration of open interest toward US regulated venues.

title: House Democrats Issue Report Detailing Trump Crypto Ties as 'New Age of Corruption'
contentSnippet: Democratic staff on the House Judiciary Committee gathered data on President Donald Trump's crypto businesses that reportedly gained his family massive wealth.

title: Bitcoin Retakes $90K in Break From Typical Pre-Thanksgiving Price Action
contentSnippet: Just when traders got used to price declines on the Wednesday ahead of Turkey Day, bitcoin pulled a reversal higher.

title: South Korea's Top Crypto Exchange to Be Absorbed By Tech Giant in $10.3 Billion Deal
contentSnippet: The pending merger, between Upbit owner Dunamu and payments giant Naver, is reportedly focused on the booming stablecoin sector.

title: Robinhood Stock Rises Following Deal That Could Boost Its Prediction Market Push
contentSnippet: Trading app Robinhood may be looking to launch its own prediction market platform, analysts say, following a newly announced acquisition.

title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Loads Up on Google, Coinbase, Circle and Bitcoin ETF Shares
contentSnippet: Tech investor Cathie Wood's investment firm remains bullish on crypto and AI, adding shares of Google, Coinbase, and a Bitcoin ETF on Tuesday.

title: Grayscale Files to Launch Zcash ETF After Privacy Coin's 1,000% Price Surge
contentSnippet: Grayscale is riding the recent Zcash hype with plans to convert its trust into an ETF.
